Activity

Identify the troubleshooting technique used in a given scenario.

Select the troubleshooting approach being described in the scenario.

1. <textformat blockindent='13'>Braseen is troubleshooting a network connectivity problem. She starts her investigation at the physical medium by checking cable connections and slowly works her way up through the layered networking model to the application software running on the hosts.</textformat>

2. <textformat blockindent='13'>Medhat is unable to connect to a site on the Internet. To begin troubleshooting he first tests network connectivity. If that fails he will work his way down the layers to the physical medium. If network connectivity tests succeed he will work his way up to troubleshooting the application software.</textformat>

3. <textformat blockindent='13'>Patti is troubleshooting an issue on the network. Based on her past experience with similar situations she assumes the problem is a bad IP configuration and starts troubleshooting with that.</textformat>

4. <textformat blockindent='13'>Allan contacts the ISP complaining of issues connecting to the Internet. He is unsure of the problem. The ISP sends a new preconfigured modem to Allan in hopes that it solves the situation.</textformat>
Correct, you successfully identified all troubleshooting techniques. Click Next to continue.
